title: [1.4.7—1.6.4][spp/smp]显示耐久2[影狼]
author: wq57
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wq57 于 2014-1-18 20:40 编辑 

你们还记得装备耐久显示么？
这里来了一个装备显示耐久2！


总耐久   装备耐久  no！！！那是钻石剑耐久！
MO更新集
1.2.10        - fixed some minor bugs with debug mode1.2.9        - Added Tooltip and compatibility with the new Show Durability 1(forge version)1.2.8        - Added Tinkers Construct support (tell me if i missed something)1.2.7        - Refactured the code1.2.6        - Armor HUD is now available with icons of the worn armor        - Addet new options to config file                - armor icons can be turned of and on                - there are two design layouts for the icons version of the armor HUD                - the way durability is displayed is now fully customizable                - empty armor slot text is also fully customizable        - Armor HUD on the left now fits dynamicly1.2.3        - Fixed a bug where keybindings got activated while typing on chat1.2.2        - Updated to 1.6.2        - Addet key bindings to switch side of Armor HUD ingame (default: l = left, graves = right)        - Settings caused by key bindings are saved in config file now        - Changed order of changelog so the most recent change is allways the first1.1.1        - fixed problem with tool HUD while riding a horse1.1.0        - Upadated to 1.6.1 (made a 1.5.2 version too)        - Addet Config file with options:                - Color                - Flicker when critical state                        - configurable conditions for flickering                - Armor Durability                        - configurable if its on the left or the right side of the hotbar        - you can toggle the Armor Display on and off ingame by pressing F7 (key is configurable in controll settings)1.0.2        - Fixed positioning bug where oxygen-bar was covered        - Adjusted positioning for creative mode1.0.1        - Released for the first time!!!        - Excitement
